sys_script.name: Update the cache

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_babdde012f8ed0108f953996f699b679
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sys_ui_script</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Update the cache</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

    // Add your code here
    var gdt = new Date();
    var gdtString = gdt.toString().replace(/ /g, '_').replace(/:/g, '_');
    var timeZone = gdtString.replace(/.*[(](.*)[)].*/, '$1');
    var dateFinal = gdtString.slice(0, 25) + timeZone;
    gs.addInfoMessage('System Property glide.lastplugin updated. ' +
        'Please be sure to push this updated property with the rest of your code. ' +
        'This will ensure that the JavaScript cache is updated on the client browser.');
    gs.setProperty('glide.lastplugin', dateFinal);

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-07-15 07:19:38</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>babdde012f8ed0108f953996f699b679</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update the cache</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="i-Automate" source="x_77533_i_automate">a3a159fc2f42d0108f953996f699b6c0</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="i-Automate">a3a159fc2f42d0108f953996f699b6c0</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_babdde012f8ed0108f953996f699b679</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-07-15 07:19:38</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=babdde012f8ed0108f953996f699b679"/></record_update>
